actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Mercion makes one Divine Radiance attack and one +1 Quarterstaff attack. She can replace one of these attacks with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Divine Radiance
entries: {@atk ms,rs} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. 13 (3d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: +1 Quarterstaff
entries: Melee atk +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) bludgeoning damage when used with two hands.

actions.name: Radiant Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: Mercion creates a magical explosion of fiery radiance centered on a point she can see within 120 feet of her. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 (8d6 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Mercion casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
